name: SEDEAHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your SEDEA Products after connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps :
1.Download our SEDEA Home app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account).
2.Configure your smart devices in SEDEA Home app and give their a convenient name.
3.Enable SEDEA Home skill on Alexa App, you'll be redirected to the login page. Follow the instruction on this page to complete the linking process
4.Tell to your Alexa Echo ""Alexa, discover my devices"" and wait for Echo to say ""Search complete""
5.Now all the setup process is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like this :
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom light"
